title: Which of the following was a reason the United ...

content.question: Which of the following was a reason the United States government believed it necessary to negotiate a treaty with Great Britain following the American Revolution?

choices.label: British activities and landholdings in North America were an impediment to western settlement and peace along the frontier.
Northerners hoped that Britainâ€™s antislavery position would pressure southern states to abolish slavery.
The Washington administration wanted to improve relations to encourage France to sell the Louisiana Territory.
The government wanted to mediate a better relationship between France and Britain to help bring peace to the European continent.

content.answer: British activities and landholdings in North America were an impediment to western settlement and peace along the frontier.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
